Package game.dialogues

Class Choice

java.lang.Object
game.dialogues.Choice
public class Choice
extends java.lang.Object
Choice class. Provides an option to branch into a different (or same) Dialogue, with side effects.
Author:
Kok Tim Ming

      effect - effect that will be triggered when Choice is selected
      toDialogue - Dialogue to go to when Choice is selected
